config.timestamp.column.name: MODIFIED_DATE
config.query: SELECT * FROM (SELECT es.WFE_TRANS_ID AS ORDER_NUMBER, es.SHIPMENT_ID, es.SERVICE_TYPE, es.DEST_SITE_ID, es.MODIFIED_DATE FROM EDOM.E_SHIPMENTS es INNER JOIN EDOM.E_SALES_ORDERS eso ON eso.SALES_ORDER_ID = es.SALES_ORDER_ID WHERE eso.SITE_ID = '00990') WHERE es.MODIFIED_DATE >= sysdate - interval '300' minute
